name: fraction 8 from naphtha separation to generic market for chemical, organic | chemical, organic | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/9475/documentation

This activity links the byproduct fraction 8 from the naphtha separation process, to the generic market for organic chemicals. All chemicals that enter this market provide the function of an organic chemical. This route is chosen due to lack of knowledge on the fate of this fraction. It may also be fed back into the general raw material streams or be used as a fuel. It is recommended to rivise this dataset accordingly as soon as possible.

The activity starts with the reception of fraction 8 from naphtha separation

The activity ends with the production of chemical, organic for the generic market
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics

processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: the present inventory is a linking activity, from fraction 8 of naphtha separation process, to the generic product "chemical, organic"
